src_original: kṣāntikṣetraṃ hi bodhisattvasya buddhakṣetraṃ;  tasmiṃstadbodhiprāptibuddhakṣetre dvātriṃśallakṣaṇalaṃkṛtāḥ kṣāntidamaparamaśamathapāramitāḥ sattvā upapatsyante /
tgt_original: 忍辱是菩薩淨土——菩薩成佛時，三十二相莊嚴眾生來生其國；

src_original: vīryakṣetraṃ hi bodhisattvasya buddhakṣetraṃ;  tasmistadbodhiprāptibuddhakṣetre sarvakuśaladharmeṣvārabdhavīryāḥ sattvā upapatsyante /
tgt_original: 精進是菩薩淨土——菩薩成佛時，勤修一切功德眾生來生其國；

src_original: dhyānakṣetraṃ hi bodhisattvasya buddhakṣetraṃ;  tasmiṃstadbodhiprāptibuddhakṣetre samyaktvaniyatasattvā upapatsyante /
tgt_original: 禪定是菩薩淨土——菩薩成佛時，攝心不亂眾生來生其國； 智慧是菩薩淨土——菩薩成佛時，正定眾生來生其國；
四無量心是菩薩淨土——菩薩成佛時，成就慈、悲、喜、捨眾生來生其國；

src_original: catvāri saṃgrahavastūni hi bodhisattvasya buddhakṣetraṃ;  tasmiṃstadbodhiprāptibuddhakṣetre sarvavimuktiparigṛhītāḥ sattvā upapatsyante /
tgt_original: 四攝法是菩薩淨土——菩薩成佛時，解脫所攝眾生來生其國；

src_original: upāyakauśalyaṃ hi bodhisattvasya buddhakṣetraṃ;  tasmiṃstadbodhiprāptibuddhakṣetre sarvopāyacaryāvicakṣaṇāḥ sattvā upapatsyante /
tgt_original: 方便是菩薩淨土——菩薩成佛時，於一切法方便無礙眾生來生其國；
三十七品是菩薩淨土——菩薩成佛時，念處、正勤、神足、根、力、覺、道眾生來生其國；
